installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt -y update
apt -y upgrade

apt -y install curl

echo "-- Downloading from : $REPO_URL"

cd /mnt/server
ls

curl -L $REPO_URL/projectdefaults/package.json > package.json
curl -L $REPO_URL/projectdefaults/index.js > index.js

echo "-- Server installed"
